amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section for the "Department of Justice-Community Oriented Policing Services Programs is hereby increased by, and the aggregate total of other amounts made available by this Act that are not required to be made available by a provision of law are hereby reduced by $177,087,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lee (CA) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
